CRANES TYPE AND CAPACITY:
4 WUHAN IHI CRANES / SWL 30.5 MT - AT HOOK WORK - 4 X 24 METRIC TONS AT GRAB WORK –(VESSEL NOT GRABS FITTED ) OWNERS WILL NOT SUPPLY CRANE OPERATORS FROM CREW.
VESSEL'S CRANES DESIGNED AND CLASS APPROVED TO OPERATE WITHIN THE DESIGNATED CAPACITIES/ PARAMETERS (AS PER MAKERS' INSTRUCTION MANUAL-AVAILABLE ON REQUEST) ONLY IN A HARBOR OR SHELTERED WATERS ENVIRONMENT WITH NO SIGNIFICANT MOVEMENT OF THE SHIP DUE TO WAVE ACTION  NOR ANY RELATIVE MOVEMENT BETWEEN CRANE /GRAB AND CARGO IF LOADING/ DISCHARGING INTO/ FROM BARGES, TRANSHIPMENT OR SIMILAR. ENVIRONMENTAL CONDITIONS TO BE LESS THAN BEAUFORT FORCE 2 AND DOUGLAS SEA STATE1. WHEN THE VESSEL CALLS AT PORT OR TERMINAL THAT REQUIRES ADDITIONAL MOORING ROPES AND/OR OF DIFFERENT SPECIFICATION FROM WHAT THE VESSEL HAS ONBOARD SAME TO BE SUPPLIED AND/OR HIRED AT CHARTERERSΆ COST/TIMENO MORE THAN 1 CRANE TO BE WORKED SIMULTANEOUSLY AT A HATCH.
MAX OUTREACH FROM C/L 24 M
MAX OUTREACH FROM SHIP’S SIDE 9.6 M
NO. 1 CRANE - BETWEEN HOLDS NOS. 1 AND 2 NO. 2 CRANE - BETWEEN HOLDS NOS. 2 AND 3 NO. 3 CRANE - BETWEEN HOLDS NOS. 3 AND 4 NO. 4 CRANE - BETWEEN HOLDS NOS. 4 AND 5
HEIGHT OF LOG STANCHIONS: NO.1 C/H 7.5M NO.2~5 C/H 8.5 M
THE CRANES ARE TO BE OPERATED ALONGSIDE BERTH ONLY. OPERATIONS IN SHELTERED AREAS ARE ALLOWED SUBJECT TO
I)             PREVAILING SWELL/WAVE CONDITIONS,
II)            MASTER'S APPROVAL AND
III)          OWNERS' WRITTEN AUTHORITY. THE CREW SHALL NOT OPERATE THE CRANES UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES.

SELF TRIMMING BULK CARRIER" - THE VESSEL IS SUITABLE TO CARRY A FULL CARGO OF FREE         FLOWING BULK GRAIN IN ALL HOLDS PROVIDED SPOUT TRIMMED AND IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE VESSEL'S GRAIN LOADING PLAN AND STABILITY CRITERIA. ALL LOADING, STOWING, SECURING,   OF CARGOES TO BE CARRIED OUT AS PER VESSEL'S LOADING AND CARGO SECURING MANUALS AS WELL AS IN ACCORDANCE WITH CLASS REQUIREMENTS, ALWAYS AT THE SATISFACTION OF THE MASTER.

STRENGTHS        TANK TOPS/DECK/HATCH COVERS 20.00/4.00/3.00 MTS/M2
HATCH COVERS MACGREGOR HYDRAULIC FOLDING – (Box type)
TANK TOP            STEEL
BULKHEADS        CORRUGATED STEEL
HOLD TYPE          DOUBLE HULL, NUMBERS 2-3-4 BOX TYPE
CONSTANTS       ABOUT 300 MTS EXCL FW UNPUMPABLES ABOUT 100 MTS BALLAST WATER NO NO GRABS ON BOARD
LASHING: YES / TIMBER & LOGS
CEMENT HOLES TWO HOLES OF 700MM DIAMETER, LOCATED FORE & AFT OF EACH HATCH

MDO CAPACITY 167.70 CBM FW CAPACITY 308.50
SPEED/CONSUMPTION
SERVICE BALLAST                             ABOUT 13.5 KNOTS ON ABOUT 24.5 MTS IFO + AE 2.0 MTS SERVICE LADEN                ABOUT 13.0 KNOTS ON ABOUT 25.5 MTS IFO + AE 2.0 MTS
ECO SPEED /CONS WOG:
BALLAST ABOUT 12.0 KNOTS ON ABOUT 17.5 MTS IFO + AE 2.0MT (LSFO) LADEN ABOUT 11.50 KNOTS ON ABOUT 18.0 MTS IFO + AE 2.0MT (LSFO)
(ABOVE ECO IS ALWAYS SUBJECT TO THE VESSEL PERIODICALLY DURING SHORT INTERVALS 2-3 HOURS, EVERY 2 DAYS INCREASING RPM IN ORDER TO MAINTAIN THE SMOOTH RUNNING OF THE MAIN ENGINE.. IT IS UNDERSTOOD THAT CONSUMPTION DURING THOSE PERIODS MAY BE ABOVE THE ALLOWED MARGINS & CHARTERERS WILL HAVE NO RIGHT TO CLAIM FOR OVERCONSUMPTION - ALWAYS SUBJECT TO PREVAILING WEATHER CONDITIONS).
PORT CONSUMPTION
PORT     IDLE       ABOUT 2.50 MTS IFO PORT          WORKING ABOUT 4.00 MTS IFO
VESSEL’S SPEED IS GIVEN UNDER GOOD-WEATHER CONDITION, 24 CONSECUTIVE HRS NOON TO NOON, WHICH IN TURN IS DEFINED AS WEATHER UP TO BEAUFORT SCALE FORCE 4 AND/OR DOUGLAS SEA-STATE 3 (WITH WAVE AND/OR SWELL HEIGHT UP TO 1.25MTR) WITH NO ADVERSE SWELL/CURRENTS. FAVORABLE CURRENTS AND BAD WEATHER DAYS NOT TO BE TAKEN INTO CONSIDERATION FOR ANY PERFORMANCE CLAIM SUBMISSION.
THE WORD  “ABOUT” APPLIES  TO  BOTH  SPEED  AND  CONSUMPTION.  IT IS DEFINED  AS  A  TOLERANCE  OF  0.5  KNTS  ON  SPEED AND  A  TOLERANCE  OF  5%  ON  BUNKER  CONSUMPTION.
